SandRise

The studio I founded to shape momentum

SandRise is a lean product practice focused on finding signal fast, designing what matters, and guiding teams through the messy middle of shipping.

I partner with founders and product leaders to translate ambition into systems, rituals, and experiences that customers trust. Whether it‚Äôs validating a new market, building the first design system, or accelerating growth, SandRise brings an operator‚Äôs mindset with an IC‚Äôs hands-on craft.

How we engage

  • Fractional product leadership for teams that need strategy and execution in the same seat.
  • Discovery sprints that surface customer signal and prioritize the next build.
  • Design systems & delivery to scale craft without slowing velocity.
  • Founder advisory supporting GTM, hiring, and operating cadence.
